ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_women] Re: neglecting our families?
ygData.msgSnippet: Okay, I just got back online from whatever it is i do when i m not...  i read a post by dave that was really disturbing... ... I m really sorry your wife isnt
ygData.messageBody:
Okay, I just got back online from whatever it is i do when i'm not... i
read a post by dave that was really disturbing...




>Occasionally, I'd read her character logs while she slept, because
>I'd wonder what a 36-y.o. woman could possibly have to discuss with
>teenage and 20-something males for endless hours...



I'm really sorry your wife isnt trustworthy. =( Poor dave =( Buy me a
Lexus...
